name: Under the Stars (itch) (helen)
description:
✭˚･ﾟ✧･ﾟ_✭˚･ﾟ✧_･ﾟ*   STORY   ✭˚･ﾟ✧･ﾟ_✭˚･ﾟ✧_･ﾟ*

.・。.・゜✧・.・。.A tale of loneliness, hope, and prayer...・。.・゜✧・.・。

Born under the Star of Solitude, princess Dulari believes she's destined to die alone. In her 20th birthday, while remembering that sad fate, her parents decide to throw a big party to make her feel better. But what they didn't expect, was that a Supermoon would rise in the exact same day she was born, bringing with it mystery, magic forces, and an adventure that will change the way Dulari sees herself forever...

✭˚･ﾟ✧･ﾟ_✭˚･ﾟ✧_･ﾟ*   FEATURES   ✭˚･ﾟ✧･ﾟ_✭˚･ﾟ✧_･ﾟ*

- Two main routes (prince & knight) and one secret route (jester)!

-  Melancholic and bittersweet platonic love stories!

- Drama! Mystery!! Love Affairs?!? ~ in a dreamy medieval setting! ~

- 3 CGs per route! (4 in the secret route)

- Point-and-click elements!

- Post-credits scenes!!!!! (i love those

- Playtime around 1-2 hours per route!

✭˚･ﾟ✧･ﾟ_✭˚･ﾟ✧_･ﾟ*   CREDITS   ✭˚･ﾟ✧･ﾟ_✭˚･ﾟ✧_･ﾟ*

- Story, art, programming: Helen/lenlen (@lenlen403)

- GUI: Raine (@puppyboydev)

- Music: Vashti Bunyan (some songs are edited tho) and Pixabay Music Library (SergeQuadrado, Ahmadmusic, lemonmusicstudio, Olexy)

- Sound Effects: Pixabay (SoundsForYou, SergeQuadrado, SamuelFrancisJohnson)

--- /// ---

Hello! I've been working on this for almost a year now. Many things happened in the meanwhile, but I'm happy I finished it. :')

I don't even have words to express all the love and tears involved in this, nor the happiness this silly game brings to me. I would love to hear your thoughts about it, be it ratings or comments. Thank you all <3
